Title: Out of the Past
Writer: Laeta Kalogridis (created by), Richard Morgan (based on the novel by), Laeta Kalogridis, Nevin Densham (executive story editor), Richard Morgan (novel)
Actors: Joel Kinnaman, James Purefoy, Martha Higareda, Chris Conner
Plot: Waking up in a new body 250 years after his death, Takeshi Kovacs discovers he's been resurrected to help a titan of industry solve his own murder.
